[ğ“ˆ–](ğ“ˆ–.html) [ğ“®](ğ“®.html) [nam](nam.html)  = nÃ¤mlich ğ“ˆ–[ğ“‡‹ğ“‡‹](ğ“‡‹ğ“‡‹.html)  

Hieroglyphic names are **not** suitable for language familiy identification!  
Apart from [Phono-semantic matching](Phono-semantic matching.html), because of lacking vowels there is just too much leeway, given a few consonants!  

Claiming a name is "purely Akkadian" when there is infinite insecureity in the pronunciation.
